caption=Fredegar Chubb from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''
Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] who appears in the [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)
column3: Extended Edition]] of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' while [[Bilbo Baggins]] visits the market outside of the [[Green Dragon]] Inn shortly after [[Gandalf]]'s visit. Bilbo buys a fish from him while there. He was portrayed by [[Eric Vespe]].
